name: CKAuto Tire Valve Stem Caps, Black, 4 pcs/Pack, Anodized Aluminum Tire Valve Cap Set, Corrosion Resistant, Universal Stem Covers for Cars Trucks Motorcycles SUVs and Bikes
short_description: Special Design – Metal materials are prone to rust in the presence of water and oxygen, which may lead to corrosion on valve body. The plastic inner valve caps design combines the attribution of corrosion resistance of plastic and the stylish look of metal.

Premium Material – CKAuto Valve Stem Caps are made of high-grade light-weight aluminum alloy, anodized & powder coated finish for maximum strength and durability, surface anodic oxidation treatment makes the color brighter.
Easy to install – The design of the tire valve cap rotating thread makes it easy to twist when install or remove.
Wide Application – The inner diameter of tire valve caps is 7mm, and the inner height is 13.8mm, so the valve caps universal fit most cars, bicycles, SUVs, trucks, RVs, and other motor vehicles, etc.

Why Choose CKAuto – CKAuto Valve Stem Caps address the challenge that some materials that may be desirable for an exterior of the valve cap can react with the materials commonly used for valve threads, and materials that do not react with the valve thread material may be undesirable for the exterior of the cap for aesthetics or performance reasons.

name: Tire Valve Caps has a Sealing Ring Tire Valve Stem Caps for Bike,Bicycle,Car,Motorbike 16pcs Black
short_description: Durable Construction:Made from plastic and rubber for a secure fitBlack exterior with red interior for a stylish look
Complete Set: Package includes 15 valve stem caps to fully outfit two vehicles or provide backup replacements
Universal Fit: Compatible with standard Schrader valve stems found on most cars, trucks, SUVs, and motorcycles
Protection: Keeps dirt, dust, and moisture away from valve stems while maintaining proper tire pressure
Easy Installation: Features knurled edges for secure grip and simple hand-tightening without need for tools
product_description: Elevate your vehicle's style and protection with these premium tire valve stem caps. This set of 8 caps is crafted from durable black plastic alloy, featuring a sleek ribbed design and striking red interior accent. The precision-engineered construction helps maintain proper tire pressure by creating a reliable seal against dust, dirt, and moisture. Each cap is carefully machined with attention to detail, ensuring a perfect fit on standard tire valve stems. The textured exterior provides excellent grip for easy installation and removal, while the aluminum construction offers superior durability compared to plastic alternatives. These valve caps add a sophisticated finishing touch to your wheels while serving the essential function of protecting your tire valves from debris and corrosion. Perfect for cars, SUVs, motorcycles, or any vehicle with standard valve stems, these caps combine both form and function in a sleek package.

name: ANKI HAPPIGO 8Pcs 2.2Bar 32-to-35 PSI Car Tire Pressure Monitor Valve Stem Caps Sensor Indicator Easy to Read 3 Color Eye Alert
short_description: Material of car tire pressure indicator caps: Chromed Metal+PC;Size:1cmX2.5cm;Visually alerts you when the tire pressure is low
Car tire pressure monitor valve caps help to avoid premature tire wear or blowouts from under-inflated tires,increases fuel efficiency, safety and control, extends tire life

Green/yellow/red system indicate level of proper tire inflation.According the recognize color to display the pressure of the tire,Green shows that tire pressure is normal Yellow shows that the pressure is 10% lower than standard Red alerts you that the pressure is 25% lower than standard

Fit for 32PSI(2.2Bar),applicable to car,motorcycle,bicycle and so on.WARNING: When removing a cap. make sure that you do not lose the black washer. They are inclined to fall out and are very difficult to find again. It is advisable to remove them before your car is serviced at a garage.
Package : 8 x Tire Pressure Indicator Valve Stem Caps.Notes:When you make automatic car wash,remove these air caps would be better.
